title: Candle Mage

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Ward three different peoples' houses with candles each night, giving them Powerful defence for the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have protection immunity. (*You cannot be affected by protective effects.*)
- The day after you protect someone successfully, their defense will be set to None and they will gain protection immunity.
- You cannot whisper.
